title: The Pressure Mounts

en: There isn't enough time. There's so much to fix, and there aren't enough hours left!
You know it's impossible to solve every issue before launch - of course you know that. But somewhere in your heart of hearts, you believed everything would come together at the last minute.
That isn't going to happen they way you wanted, and you have to accept it.

no_caption: I need to struggle very, very hard

en: Sometimes giving up is the best thing you can do.
Maybe, if you just work hard enough, there's a chance. Your run-up to launch is clear: No sleep, and a dozen strong coffees. This is going to hurt.
